original_title: Explorez le Festival du Roi Lion & de la Jungle
overview: A team of three journalists has followed and filmed every week since the beginning of the year, the crucial steps to create the shows Jungle Rhythm and The Lion King: Rhythms of the Pride Lands.  Follow the creation of these shows, from music recording to season opening, artist rehearsals, set design and much more...
title: Explore the Lion King and Jungle Festival
